name: Rhythm Dance Stickman Mod
description:
Welcome to stickman mod
You have a very simple task here to play when the arrow marks come from the bottom, when the arrows are on the up arrow, then press the arrows perfectly.
Show us your musical skills:
Use the Up, Down, Left and Right buttons to follow the rhythm.
- Free to play: Play with songs of specific difficulty
Challenge: The speed will increase with the level of play.

Enjoy.
